p.k: Classic noir thriller. A man returns home after WWII to find his wife's been unfaithful. When she's murdered, he turns detective. Language and attitudes
Western starring Audie Murphy, Stephen McNally, Faith Domergue and Susan Cabot. A gunslinger and a marshal join forces to hunt a violent gang of claim jumpers
Claudette Colbert plays the new newspaper proprietor in a tough Texan town whose crusade against crooked cattle barons makes her a vulnerable target
Adventure with Richard Greene, Peter Cushing and a young Oliver Reed. Can Robin Hood foil the villainous Sheriff of Nottingham's evil plan to murder
. allen: (2009) Raucous, violent sci-fi action sequel in which a couple (Shia LaBeouf and Megan Fox) must try to prevent the Decepticon robots
Action fantasy sequel. Can Charles Xavier and his young mutants prevent god-like Apocalypse and his allies from destroying the world? With James McAvoy and Oscar Isaac
Gory horror-thriller starring Elizabeth Mitchell. In the third chapter of the dystopian tale, a senator attempts to stop the night of slaughter
Thriller with Eddie Marsan. A radio talk show host is taken hostage before going live on air. He must broadcast, but the script will not be his
